title: Strengthening AI Practice Competencies: Intensive Short-Term Workshop for Open Educator Capability Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand the legal and technical characteristics of open educational resources and apply them to practical settings.
Educational modules can be developed according to collaboration-based learning design principles

Learners establish a 3-stage AI project evaluation framework using open assessment tools (portfolio, peer review) within one week and propose solutions meeting ≥80% of criteria in an evaluation rubric (checklist)

Learners explore ≥3 OER platforms (MERLOT, OER Commons, etc.) to identify ≥5 AI education-related contents within one week and create a shared content strategy document specifying selection criteria (relevance, accessibility, licensing) for institution-wide sharing
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
